mapper.select: select * from ACT_HI_COMMENT c left join ACT_ID_USER u on c.USER_ID_=u.ID_ where PROC_INST_ID_=#{id} order by c.TIME_;

SELECT DISTINCT t1.ID_ AS taskId, t1.NAME_ AS taskName, t2.NAME_ AS formName, t2.TENANT_ID_ AS systemSn, t2.BUSINESS_KEY_ AS businessKey, t2.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processInstanceId, t1.CREATE_TIME_ AS startTime, t4.FIRST_ AS creator, t5.START_TIME_ AS instanceStartTime, t5.END_TIME_ AS instanceEndTime, t1.PROC_DEF_ID_ AS processDefinitionId FROM ACT_RU_TASK t1 INNER JOIN ACT_RU_EXECUTION t2 ON t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = t2.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK t3 ON t3.TASK_ID_ = t1.ID_ LEFT JOIN act_id_user t4 on t4.ID_=t2.START_USER_ID_ INNER JOIN act_hi_procinst t5 on t5.PROC_INST_ID_=t1.PROC_INST_ID_ WHERE t2.BUSINESS_KEY_ IS NOT NULL AND ( t1.ASSIGNEE_ = #{userCode} OR ( t1.ASSIGNEE_ IN ( SELECT G.group_id_ FROM ACT_ID_MEMBERSHIP G WHERE G.user_id_ = #{userCode} ) ) OR ( ( t1.ASSIGNEE_ IS NULL OR t1.ASSIGNEE_ = '' ) AND ( t3.USER_ID_ = #{userCode} OR t3.GROUP_ID_ IN ( SELECT g.group_id_ FROM ACT_ID_MEMBERSHIP g WHERE g.user_id_ = #{userCode} ) ) ) ) order by t1.CREATE_TIME_ desc

SELECT DISTINCT t1.ID_ AS taskId, t1.NAME_ AS taskName, t1.TENANT_ID_ AS systemSn, t1.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processInstanceId, t1.START_TIME_ AS startTime, t1.END_TIME_ AS endTime, t2.FIRST_ AS creator, t1.START_TIME_ AS instanceStartTime, t1.END_TIME_ AS instanceEndTime, t1.PROC_DEF_ID_ AS processDefinitionId FROM ACT_HI_TASKINST t1 LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst t3 on t3.PROC_INST_ID_=t1.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_id_user t2 on t2.ID_=t3.START_USER_ID_ where t1.ASSIGNEE_=#{userCode}

select DISTINCT t.ACT_ID_ as nodeId, t.ACT_NAME_ as nodeName, t.ASSIGNEE_ as userCode, t.ASSIGNEE_ as userCode, u.FIRST_ as userName, t.END_TIME_ as endTime from ACT_RU_ACTINST t LEFT JOIN ACT_ID_USER u on t.ASSIGNEE_=u.ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_RU_TASK ru on ru.PROC_INST_ID_=#{id} where t.ACT_TYPE_ = 'userTask' and t.PROC_INST_ID_=#{id} and t.END_TIME_ is not null and t.DELETE_REASON_ is null and t.ACT_ID_ !=ru.TASK_DEF_KEY_;
select * from ACT_HI_COMMENT c left join ACT_ID_USER u on c.USER_ID_=u.ID_ where TASK_ID_=#{id} and ACTION_ ='AddComment' order by c.TIME_;

SELECT DISTINCT t2.FIRST_ , t1.ACT_NAME_ , t1.PROC_INST_ID_ , t1.START_TIME_ , t1.END_TIME_, t1.TASK_ID_, t1.ACT_TYPE_ FROM act_hi_actinst t1 LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst t3 on t3.PROC_INST_ID_=t1.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_id_user t2 on t2.ID_=t1.ASSIGNEE_ where t1.PROC_INST_ID_=#{instanceId} and (t1.ACT_TYPE_='startEvent' or t1.ACT_TYPE_= 'userTask' or t1.ACT_TYPE_= 'endEvent' ) order by t1.START_TIME_
